reviewText: It's a bit sloppy in the editing, it's not Loren's finest acting, and the script is a bit mess. Still quite entertaining though.

This 1979 films based upon revenge seeking wife of a deceased scientist who enlists a number of specialist helpers one of whom is an ex to defeat the varies parties who are guarding rich crook (who no-one but a small cadre know what he looks like) in his heavily guarded hideaway.
loved it, Sophia Loren, very sexy
It's all about watching these big name actors in these silly and gritty stories. Great fun.

Subterfuge, suspense, tension, mystery, action, twist of plot, surprise ending, glued to your seat, get enough popcorn or whatever, OJ gets blown up, not politically correct, Outstanding movie, and it will hold your attention like gripping your shirt front!!!!!

I must say I was kinda disappointed with this film after being so thrilled at it's debut release on dvd and blueray  Being a fan of the action adventure
genre of the 1970's  I expected something along the lines of the star packed 70's films like "killer force" or "Golden needles" both films which need a
new release treatment. But even with the ever beautiful Sophia Loren and charismatic James Coburn in the driver's seat this one seemed kind of a
runaway train of whatever. Sure there were explosions and car chases, the slick one liners and the great location shots but there was nothing to hold
it together.,that see thru-paper thin wire that suppose to pull the story a certain direction. "muddlement" is a term that comes to mind. Anyway I'm not
sorry I purchased...It's a great print , in it's correct widescreen ratio and comes with the original theater which plays much smoother than the film.

This movie is so lucky that I gave it 3 stars. could have gone to the dark side on this. First let's get an aging James Coburn, but he still does an okay job, get an actress who really never was much of an actress (some films maybe, but not many) Sophia Loren, get O'J. Simpson, never, ever an actor. Then get some cool veterans, Eli Wallach and Vincent Gardenia and shake and throw in a very predictable plot and solution and here you have it one of Sir Lew Grades not so good movies. some of them were good bad this was just not good. You can avoid this and hope you can see it for free somewhere if you really want to. I say don't go out of your way for it.
Should be a great Blu-ray.  Haven't watched.

Very disappointing. I have tried this DVD in my computer, in my DVD player and it does not work in either. Being from Antigua, where part of the movie was filmed, I was really looking forward to adding this movie to my collection.
All expectations were met. Thank you!
I bought this DVD to see Sophia Loren, and it's worth every Penney, as she is incredibly beautiful, and sexy looking as can be. Too bad OJ Simpson is in this movie LOL
